user_query: I want to get tips for taking care of my new puppy, including feeding, grooming, training, and recommendations for pet supplies and toys.

TaskList.description: Research and compile tips for feeding a new puppy.
Research and compile tips for grooming a new puppy.
Research and compile tips for training a new puppy.
Find and recommend local pet stores or online shops for purchasing pet supplies.
Research and recommend fun and interactive toys suitable for a new puppy.
